updating.notes:
Major changes since version 2.x.x:

* In version 2.x.x, the CLI had a project file structure including a 'repository' directory (and a 'builds' directory, 'shared', etc.). In version 3.x.x, this is no longer the case: the CLI operates directly inside your project's Git repository. The CLI will work with the old file structure, and there is a migration tool ('platform legacy-migrate') for updating to the new structure.

* The web root has changed location from 'www' to '_www', to avoid conflicts with actual project files in the repo.

* The CLI now requires PHP version 5.5.9 (minimum) due to updated dependencies.

Version 3.x.x also comes with many other smaller improvements and bug fixes.
The web root has moved again, from '.www' to '_www'. If you have already been using version 3, you may wish to update your local web server configuration.

* Adds 'db:size' command for a rough estimate of DB disk usage
* Fixes database commands where the relationship name is not 'database'
* Fixes 'sql' command on PostgreSQL databases

See: https://github.com/platformsh/platformsh-cli/releases/v3.8.0

* Adds `environment:push` (`push`) command
* Adds `--identity-file` option to commands using SSH
* Adds `--parent` option to `environment:activate` command

This release adds new options to the db:dump command:
  --gzip (-z) to compress the output
  --table to specify the table(s) to include
  --exclude-table to specify the table(s) to exclude
  --schema-only to include only schemas, not data

And other minor bug fixes. See:
https://github.com/platformsh/platformsh-cli/releases/v3.11.0

* Add `project:set-remote` command
* Clarify self-update messages
* Some minor bug fixes in the `branch`, `checkout`, and `integration:get` commands

* Improve `get` command when the user does not have access to `master` branch
* Allow `web` command to be used with a non-existent environment ID
* Allow `updates.check` to be overridden by an env var, e.g. `PLATFORMSH_CLI_UPDATES_CHECK=0`
* More specific suggested `.gitignore` file for Drupal vanilla projects

* The `build` command now installs build-time dependencies by default (use
  `--no-deps` for the old behavior).
* This release also adds commands to run a local web server (the PHP built-in
  server). But these commands are at a "beta" stability, and they can only be
  enabled via a feature flag, for example:

  # ---- ~/.platformsh/config.yaml ----
  experimental:
      # Enable "platform create" command.
      enable_create: true
      # Enable "platform server:run" and related commands.
      enable_local_server: true

* Added `route:get` command to view a resolved route to an application
* Renamed `environment:routes` command to `route:list` (still under the alias `routes`)
* Improved caching for relationships, routes, and app config
* Fixed integration option names

This release adds `certificate` commands, to list, add, and delete SSL certificates from a project, including new automatically-provisioned Let's Encrypt certificates.

Other changes since v3.14.5:

* Fix an issue using `ssh` command on Windows
* Make detection of the system timezone fallback to the PHP default
* Use pseudo-terminal for SSH where possible (enables colors for some CLI programs)
* Minor improvements to `activity:list`

* Added a `--directory` option to `db:dump`
* Added ability to load more than 10 activities in `activity:list`
* Added `auth:token` and `project:curl` commands (intended for support and debugging)
* Updated `self::install` so it doesn't write Bashisms to `.profile`
* Updated activity descriptions
* Switched to GitBook native search (rather than Google) in `docs` command

* Added new `mount:upload` and `mount:download` commands, which help
  transferring files to and from writable file mounts, and a `mount:list`
  command which shows the available mounts. Thanks to @markushausammann for the
  PR.
* Users may now log in with their username instead of their email address.
* Fixed a bug introduced in v3.20.5, which unintentionally hid output from
  external commands.

* Added automatic generation of YAML-format Drush site aliases for Drupal projects (in addition to the current PHP-format site aliases). Use `platform drush-aliases -r` to recreate aliases.
* Moved site aliases from `~/.drush` to `~/.drush/site-aliases`.
* Fixed the table of environments to stop wrapping environment IDs (it was breaking color formatting).
* Changed wording of 'rebuild' warning, to 'redeploy'.

- A public website URL can now be used in the --project (-p) option
- Added `--exclude` and `--include` options to `mount` commands
- Added `--excluded-environments` option for webhook integrations*
- Added Gitlab integration support*

(* the last two will apply to an upcoming Platform.sh version, 2.7)

* Add repo:cat and repo:ls commands
* Allow default target/source in mount:upload and mount:download when --yes is used
* Add -W alias to --no-wait option in push command
* (from Symfony Console 3.4) Allow case-insensitive command shortcuts
* (from Symfony Console 3.4) Fix combining one-letter options
* Write curl debug output to STDERR, not STDOUT
* Fix some Drush 9.0.0-rc1 compatibility issues

* Extends interactive question text in `integration:add` command, to clarify the meaning of options, their defaults, and their syntax
* Adds support for the "Enabled" (`is_enabled`) flag on environment variables.
* Adds `--no-expired` and `--only-expired` options to `certificate:list`
* Improves the "project not found" message, to suggest other project IDs
* Implements omitting non-required empty fields when adding an integration (allows earlier support for new integration options without breaking older projects)
* Adds the SSH_AGENT_PID to auto inherited environment variables (fixes using an SSH agent to manage keys when used with the CLI's Git commands)
* Adds an experimental `redis` command to connect to a Redis container (hidden from the command list for now)
* Adds experimental OS X Keychain support (enabled via `experimental.use_keychain`)

New features:
* Support remote projects/environments in app:list command.
* Add worker:list (workers) command.
* Use "deployments" HTTP API (instead of SSH) in app:config command.
* Auto-ensure webhooks on GitHub and GitLab integrations, where possible.

Other changes:
* Skip updates check if the Phar file is not writable.
* Remove different coloration for local commands in `list` (there are so few listed).
* Recommend --no-wait if snapshot:create is run in a non-TTY.
* Suggest project:set-remote in RootNotFoundException.
* Fix environment:drush (drush) command to use configured document root, or PLATFORM_DOCUMENT_ROOT where available.
* Be stricter about when to use $_ENV, when getting parent variables for PHP <7.1.

* Use browser login by default (the old login method is available as `auth:password-login`).
* Set `--build-pull-requests-post-merge` to false by default (GitHub integrations).
* Respect `--no-wait` in `environment:init`, and clear the environment cache afterwards.
* In the `project:delete` command, leave access control to the API.
* Support disabling or enabling colorized output via the CLICOLOR_FORCE environment variable.

* Improved `activity:log` output to show more activity information.
* Added `activity:get` command, hidden for now.
* Added `--date-fmt` option to `activity:list` and `snapshot:list`.
* Added detection for the date.timezone ini setting, and the TZ environment variable.
* Fixed inverted requirement of -e/-a options in activity:log (`-a` should make `-e` not required).
* Fixed user-defined aliases being prefixed with "@" (thanks to @GROwen, #677).
* Avoid fatal error if invalid YAML config is encountered during updateDrushAliases().
* Fixed SSH commands for very old OpenSSH versions <5.9 (using -t instead of RequestTTY).
* Updated dependencies (mainly Symfony 3.4.2 -> 3.4.4).

* [user:add] Improve `user:add` command to allow setting roles on all environments (aliased to `user:update`)
* [user:get] Add `user:get` command (aliased to and deprecating `user:role`)
* [db:dump] Remove --no-autocommit and simplify mysqldump args (#683)
* Expand redeploy warning to recommend `vset`
* [activity:get] Check for empty started_at when calculating duration
* [redis] Recommend "redis info" command

* Add `redeploy` command (available on projects with newer API versions).
* [activity:list] Format activity descriptions where possible.
* Print question text even when in automatic non-interactive mode.
* Add --wait option to all commands, and emit a warning if nothing is specified
  when running inside a Platform.sh build/cron/deploy hook.
* [integration:add] [integration:update] Ensure GitLab/GitHub hooks have the
  right events selected, and update them if not.
* [self:install] Ensure directory exists when creating shell-config.rc
* [activity:get] do not require an environment with --all and a partial ID
* [login] Mention --force option, if running when already logged in.

New features:

* Always interact (where possible) to ask for the project or environment, if one
  isn't specified or detected.
* Support new variable features:
  - Add `variable:create` and `variable:update` commands.
  - Allow creating 'sensitive' and 'non-inheritable' variables
    (`--sensitive=true` and `--inheritable=false`).
  - Add `variable:list` (`variables`) command.
  - These `variable:` commands now work with project- or environment-level
    variables. Specify the level with `--level` (`-l`). If you do not specify a
    level, you will be asked for one interactively where relevant.
  - The old commands still exist but are hidden from the command list.
* Add `project:clear-build-cache` command
* Enable `project:create` (`create`) command by default.
* Add `--all` option to `list` command, to show hidden commands.
* In `build` command, if --run-deploy-hooks option is used, run both "deploy"
  and "post_deploy" hooks.

Bug fixes:

* Fix: boolean false fields omitted when creating integrations.
* Fix wrapping of table cell contents that include decoration.

Other changes:

* Accept URLs (not just IDs) as project identifiers in `multi` command.
* Un-hide some commands
  - Un-hide `activity:get` command.
  - Un-hide `worker:list` (`workers`)
* Always use the deployment API for the app list (improves compatibility for
  multi-application Enterprise projects, in SSH-related commands).

New features:

* Add MongoDB commands: mongo, mongoexport, mongodump, and mongorestore.
* In the user:add command, add a wildcard (%) for the environment ID, so you can
  add users to multiple environments concisely via the --role option.
  See: platform help user:add
* Parse !include tags when loading a YAML file.

Other changes:

* In command help, word-wrap option descriptions to the terminal width.
* Try to refresh an environment before giving an "Operation not available" error.
* Fix `--pipe` option in the `user:role` command.
* Suppress PHP's timezone warning while detecting the system timezone.

* Increase the default interval between updates checks, from 1 day to 7 days.
* Fix formatting for activity descriptions that contain a `/` character.
* In the `project:set-remote` command, do not error out if the "current" project
  does not exist.
* Minor performance improvement to `user` commands when looking up existing
  users.

* Add `mount:size` command to find the disk usage of writable mounts.
* Add `--sensitive` option for project-level variables (affects commands:
  `variable:create`, `variable:update`, and `variable:list`).
* Clear environment/project caches after a 403 error.
* Increase prominence of warning in `db:size` command.
* Skip the automatic updates check if the Phar file is not writable.

New features:

* Add `service:list` (`services`) command.
* Add --depth option to `project:get` (`get`) command (allow shallow clones).
* Add --rebase option to the `environment:synchronize` (`sync`) command.
* Add --prune-branches option for GitHub and GitLab integrations.
* Add --worker option to the `environment:ssh` (`ssh`) command.

Other changes:

* When running pg_dump via the `db:dump` command, use the --no-owner flag.
* Fix the `--all` option in the `list` command.
* Prefer .bashrc over .bash_profile in the installer (self:install command).
* Remove legacy API workaround in `integration:update`.
* Update user commands for upstream API fix (improves performance).

New features:

* Add commit:list (commits) and commit:get commands for viewing commits via the
  API.
* Add --commit (-c) option to repo:cat and repo:ls commands.
* Add Bitbucket integration support.

Bug fixes:

* Fix drush alias group name prepending bug. Custom aliases were having the
  alias group name prepended every time they were recreated, e.g. "@foo.bar"
  would become "@foo.foo.bar".
* Allow changing the value of a project-level sensitive variable.

Other changes:

* Add explanations for "Operation not available" on environment actions.
* Add additional help for the mount:size command.
* Clean up --pipe output in the user:get command.
* Show hidden service commands.

* Fix a further source of 'Not logged in' errors immediately after login.
* Add `integration:validate` command, and improve error reporting in other
  integration commands.
* Deprecate the --type option in the `integration:update` command.
* Fix alpha UI URLs for environments in the `web` command.

New features:

* Add --columns option for all tables (to filter and order table columns).
* Add non-default "disk" and "size" columns to app:list command.
* Add non-default "updated_at" column to domains:list command.
* Add non-default "host" column to project:list command.
* Allow loading more than 10 snapshots via --limit in snapshot:list command.

Other changes:

* Change CSV/TSV table output to make it cleaner. CSV/TSV cells will now only
  be enclosed in quote marks if necessary, conforming to RFC 4180.
* Fail if password input cannot be hidden in auth:password-login command.
* Set the remote only for new branches in environment:branch command.
* Avoid wrapping dates in commit:list command.
* Update list of allowed SSH key algorithms for ssh-key:add command.
* Remove confirmation step in logout command.

* Revert csv/tsv table output to use LF instead of CRLF line breaks.
* Display project and environment title/ID in the following commands:
  `activity:list` (`activities`), `domain:list` (`domains`),
  `route:list` (`routes`), `snapshot:list` (`snapshots`),
  `user:list` (`users`), `worker:list` (`workers`) 
* Local build: handle `python3` dependencies type (same as `python`).
* Define the `path` column in the `mount:list` (`mounts`) command.
* Parse project URLs from the beta unified-UI.

* Allow restoring snapshots to another environment in snapshot:restore command
  (with new --target and --branch-from options).
* Sort interactive project/environment choices alphabetically.
* Fix "Name"/"name" column should always have been "Title"/"title" in
  environment:list command.
* Define "created" and "updated" columns in environment:list command.
* Remove interactivity check from installer.
* Fix: environments with an empty name (e.g. '0') not being recognized.
* Fix documentation in user:list, user:add and user:update commands.
* Various changes and new features in certificate:list command:
  - only show non-expired certificates by default
  - add --ignore-expiry option for the previous behavior
  - add --exclude-domain option to filter out certificates from the list
  - add --pipe-domains option to list domains covered by certificates
  - add "certs" alias
  - define "domains" column (for the --columns option)

New features:

* Add tunnel:single command (allow opening a tunnel without posix/pcntl).

Bug fixes:

* Fix bug where login to a new account does not log out from the old account.
* Account for differing app roots in Drush aliases - allows generated Drush
  aliases to work with Platform.sh Enterprise environments.
* Fix Drush 9 alias compatibility (and remove Drush 9-beta compatibility).

New features:

* Support multiple schemas per database relationship:
  - Add --schema option to `db:dump` and `db:sql` commands.
  - Include the service name and schema in the `db:dump` default filename.
  - Present a choice between schemas if no schema is specified.
  - Make `db:size` schema agnostic but warn about inaccessible schemas.

Bug fixes:

* Use a different Drush alias root for site-local versions 8 or 9. Drush 9
  fails to find a Drupal root via a relative path in some circumstances.
* Fix behavior of choice questions with no default in non-interactive mode.
* Fix checkout command when there is only one branch.
* Fix Drush lock files not being used in local:build command.

Other changes:

* Add some 3-letter command aliases:
  - activity:list => activities => act
  - environment:list => environments => env
  - project:list => projects => pro
  - variable:list => variables => var
